SEARCH
Package com.lboric.soccerdnd.services.impl

Class PlayerServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.lboric.soccerdnd.services.impl.PlayerServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerService
@Service public class PlayerServiceImpl extends Object implements PlayerService
Implementation of the PlayerService interface that handles operations related to Player entities. This service provides methods for retrieving, adding, and updating player data. It interacts with the PlayerRepository to perform database operations and utilizes custom exceptions to handle specific error scenarios.

The following operations are supported:

  • Retrieve a single player by their ID or name and surname.
  • Retrieve all players.
  • Add a new player or multiple players to the repository.
  • Update an existing player's information.
  • Delete a player by their ID.

Each method throws specific exceptions, such as PlayerNotFoundException and PlayerAlreadyExistsException, to indicate failure scenarios and ensure clear communication of issues to the calling layers.

This class also logs significant actions and errors, aiding in debugging and operational monitoring.
